ComicInfo.Summary:
EISNER AND RINGO AWARD-WINNING WRITER MARK RUSSELL'S SATIRICAL THRILLER CONTINUES!
Can Erica lead the captives out of the Rumpus Room and back to freedom? Find out in the latest chapter of Eisner and Ringo Award-winning writer Mark Russell's all-new satirical thriller!
Erica concocts a plan to escape billionaire Bob Schrunk's nightmarish Rumpus Room…though it takes a lot of convincing to get the other prisoners to go along with it. Meanwhile, Schrunk takes his lawyer on a bizarre art shopping spree, all while dodging questions from the press concerning the strange rumors about his disappearing employees.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-29 02:16:28. [Issue ID 1030436]
